sqrt(2) * sqrt(pi) / 2 * SUM(n, 0, oo, (-(t ^ 2) / 2) ^ n / factorial(n))

rule.name: ApplyIdentity
rule.str: rewrite (t ^ 2 * -2) ^ n * (1/4) ^ n to (-(t ^ 2) / 2) ^ n using identity

steps.res: sqrt(2) * sqrt(pi) / 2 * exp(-(t ^ 2) / 2)
sqrt(2) * sqrt(pi) / 2 * exp(-(t ^ 2 / 2))
sqrt(2) * sqrt(pi) / 2 * exp(-(t ^ 2 / 2))
